actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the allowance of bonus depreciation and the increased expensing limitations permanent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent: (1) the special depreciation allowance for certain property acquired after December 31, 2007 (bonus depreciation); and (2) the increased $250,000 expensing allowance for depreciable business assets.
